title: zkkeynest
description: Zero-knowledge API key management platform designed for developers, offering secure credential storage with client-side encryption and one-time sharing capabilities.
features: Zero-knowledge encryption ensuring no access to user's actual encryption keys with AES-256-GCM encryption standard
Secure API key storage and management with rotation reminders and copy-safe key views for enhanced security workflows
One-time sharing with expiring links enabling safe credential distribution without exposing keys in chat logs or emails
Multi-tier pricing model from free (10 keys) to enterprise, with social login via Google/GitHub and team collaboration features

title: Job Tracker Tools
description: Comprehensive job search platform that aggregates listings from multiple job boards with AI-powered career tools and LinkedIn automation.
features: Multi-source job aggregation with daily updates and advanced filtering by title, skills, location, experience, salary, and source
Application tracking system with dedicated status monitoring and follow-up management for centralized job search organization
AI-powered resume tailoring that customizes resumes for specific applications and generates personalized cover letters
LinkedIn Contact Finder using browser automation to identify HR contacts and hiring managers for effective networking

title: Boorkin Industries
description: Multi-role service marketplace connecting pet care clients with accredited veterinary technicians, featuring sophisticated booking management and integrated payment processing.
features: Role-based authentication with dynamic user dashboards and complete contractor application/approval workflow for Southeast Florida's luxury pet care market
Advanced booking system with multi-service selection, date range scheduling, real-time availability calendars, and integrated Stripe payment processing including escrow functionality
Internal communication system with contextual messaging tied to active bookings, comprehensive email notifications, and real-time chat with unread message tracking
Administrative dashboard with contractor management, booking oversight, metrics visualization, payment tracking, and platform analytics with financial reporting

title: PrompterWave
description: Subscription-based SaaS platform optimizing Stable Diffusion prompts with AI-powered keyword enhancement and Firebase database integration.
features: AI-powered keyword optimization for enhanced Stable Diffusion image generation with intelligent prompt refinement
Subscription-based SaaS model with integrated Stripe payment processing for seamless recurring billing management
Firebase database integration for efficient storage and retrieval of prompts and user-generated responses
Dedicated brainstorming workspace helping users balance creativity and technical promptability in text-to-image workflows

title: Blithe Computer Repair
description: Professional computer repair service landing page featuring modern design principles and smooth animations for enhanced user experience.
features: Dynamic and interactive user interfaces built with ReactJS for engaging customer interactions
Server-side rendering with Next.js for enhanced performance and improved SEO optimization
Streamlined and customizable styling system using Tailwind CSS for consistent design language
Smooth and captivating animations powered by Framer Motion to enhance user engagement and experience

title: AI Cover Letter Writer
description: Intelligent cover letter generation platform using OpenAI's API to create personalized cover letters based on job requirements and user information.
features: AI-powered cover letter generation using OpenAI's API to create personalized content based on job requirements and user profile data
Secure user account system with Firebase authentication for convenient storage and management of personal information and cover letter history
Precise generation controls ensuring tailored and unique cover letters for each specific job application
Fully responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop with letter history database storing all generation parameters for easy reference

title: Swakabilly Chat
description: Real-time chat application with Firebase authentication and database management, featuring secure messaging and room-based communication.
features: Real-time messaging system using Firebase for instant message delivery and synchronization across all connected users
Secure user authentication and authorization system managing user access and permissions for chat participation
Dynamic chat room creation and joining functionality allowing users to organize conversations by topics or groups
Message management system enabling users to edit or delete their own messages with secure access controls

title: A Really Cool Blog
description: Modern blog application built with Next.js 13 featuring Sanity.io CMS integration, dynamic page routing, and seamless content management capabilities.
features: Responsive and visually appealing design using Next.js 13 and Tailwind CSS ensuring seamless user experience across all devices
Sanity.io CMS integration with powerful content management system enabling efficient content creation and dynamic page routing
GROQ query language implementation for efficient data retrieval and Next.js 13 optimizations for enhanced performance
User-friendly Preview/Admin mode with Google authentication allowing content creators to add blog posts from any device
